transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yes, ma'am.
Customer: Ha madam. 
Executive: Uh, ma'am, jo ye ticket open hua hai, toh isko mujhe close karna hai. Already vaise toh mera discussion ho chuka hai sir ke sath. Kal discuss ho gaya hai but aapki side se ek miss call aaya tha. Aapke end se koi query ya koi doubt hai services ke regarding?
Customer: Ha doubt hai madam. 
Executive: Madam, 
Customer: Valuable byleads nahi aa raha hai madam.
Executive: Bylead balance nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Ha valuable balance.
Executive: Achha, aap ek minute call pe rahiye, main check karti hu. Kitni bylead aapne abhi ki date mein consume ki hai. Ma'am, aapne last jo bylead consume ki hai kal ki thi aur
Customer: Ha kal kal kiye.
Executive: R. Vinod ki client Vinod naam hai client ka. Yes. So inki side se kya feedback hai?
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Inki side se kya feedback hai? Connect ho paya client ke sath?
Customer: Matlab baat hui hai aapke buyer se?
Executive: Name, client ID, bylead bylead bylead ka consume kiya. Okay?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: One bylead bhi no conversation purchase.
Executive: Okay. Then
Executive: You connect with him?
Customer: Ha ya.
Executive: Properly. So, uh, you have make a deal with the client?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Actually ma'am mere paas na mere paas kuch byleads abhi available hai. Like main first bylead aapko batati hu. Ye Telangana ki bylead hai, Telangana. One hour ago mere paas aayi hai. Commercial laundry washing machine ki requirement hai. Aur jo buyer hai wo 18 years se IndiaMART ke sath jude hue hain. 15 kg ki inko capacity chahiye. Maybe ye wali deal aapki 101% convert ho sakti hai. Main aapke WhatsApp number pe link share karungi is bylead ka. Aap WhatsApp open karke waha se ha abhi just share kar rahi hu. Aap WhatsApp se open karoge na bylead ko toh aap isko consume kar sakte ho, thik hai? Dusra cheez main na main aapko on daily basis pe bylead share kiya karungi. Aap bhi mere ko call karke connect karke ye cheez confirm ma'am please zarur kariyega ki aapke paas jo bylead aa rahe hain relevant hai ki nahi. Like your feedback mere ko chahiye. Agar feedback aap doge toh main cheezon ko thik karungi, okay? Then ek cheez mere ko confirm karni hai. Ye hamara PNS mein main aapke jo number dekh rahi hu aapne two number map karaye hue hain PNS mein.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Two number. 
Executive: Ha. Ha do number map hai ye PNS mein. Toh first number aapka hai, second number jo hai wo sir ka number hai. 
Customer: Ha sir ka number hai second number.
Executive: Sir se mera discussion ho gaya hai, thik hai? Toh wo main inform kar dungi aur dusra profile pe hamari jo hai ek IMS score hota hai jisse aapki activity show hoti hai. Jo aapka 4 by 4 hona chahiye but aapko services liye hue abhi three years complete ho gaye IndiaMART ke sath aapko jude hue, thik hai? Toh aapko properly active rehna padega per week. Aisa nahi ki aap is week active ho then next week aap thode kam active ho jao, ye nahi karna hai. Hume properly active rehna hoga tabhi hamara score 4 by 4 hoga. Mere ko ek baar aap product ke bare mein bata do. First main ye catalog pe kaam bhi kar lungi sath mein. Maine product add karaye hain kuch kal karaye the. Aapka jo annual turnover yaha pe mention hai wo 40 lakh se leke 1.5 CR tak ka hai. Thik hai? Services bhi dekho abhi hamari chal rahi hai. Services mein aapko bylead ka issue aa raha hai. Main wo aapka concern samajh ke solve karaungi. Thik hai ma'am? Iske alawa mere me ek minute rukiye aap. Iske alawa mere paas na bahut sare aise options hai. Aapne trade.indiamart.com ka naam suna hai? Ye bhi purane jo aapke account manager the unhone guide kiya hai aapko Trade India ke bare mein?
Customer: Trade India.
Executive: Yes. Trade India. Trade.indiamart.com. It's our website. Aap is website pe relevant engagement ki jo requirement hai buyers ke hand se jo aati hai IndiaMART mein aap wo bylead yaha se jaake consume kar sakte hain. Thik hai? Aur dusra mere ko ek resolution mein aapko yahi diya hai ki Trade India se abhi aap bylead uthane ki koshish karo, thik hai? Engagement aapki engagement abhi thik ho jayegi agar aap properly active rahoge per week. Bylead ka discussion maine aapko bata diya hai. Main aapko bylead bhi share kar diya hai WhatsApp pe. Aap WhatsApp pe bhi jaake dekh lena. 
Customer: WhatsApp pe aapko send kar do.
Executive: Ha aap mere ko call kar lena koi dikkat nahi hai aur ma'am kuch product hamare ye A B C D rank hota hai na product ka?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Toh aapke kuch product hai jo B rank mein bhi hai aur A rank mein bhi hai aur C mein hai out of stock bhi hai. Jaise stainless steel instrument trolley ke naam se product hai iska primary mapping nahi ho rakha hai. Thik hai? Toh main mapping kar rahi hu. Aap product ki photo and detail isme add kar doge ya main add karaun?
Customer: Add karo ji.
Executive: Aap add kar dena ek baar catalog proper photo vagera product ke wo saare send kar do aapko.
Customer: Send kar do hamare catalog total aapko send kar do.
Executive: Yes, sure, sure. Aap mere ko send kar do. Main add kar dungi apni side se, okay?
Customer: Okay ma'am.
Executive: Ha. Baki koi doubt ya koi aur query?
Customer: Nahi. Thank you.
Executive: Toh ma'am main ye ticket close kara du?
Customer: Sure madam.
Executive: Ya, sure. Thank you very much ma'am. Thank you so much.
Customer: Abhi send karta hu.
Executive: Aapke paas ma'am yes. Ma'am main ye ticket abhi close kar rahi hu na toh aapke paas ek mail mail aayega aapke paas thodi der baad. Us mail mein aapko CLM aayega toh usse na apna feedback share kar dena. Yes pe click kar dena usme yes.
Customer: Okay. Yes share kar do.
Executive: Okay. Yes main aapko share kar rahi hu. Okay ma'am.
Customer: Thank you ma'am.
Executive: Ek minute.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving valuable buyleads.

- Wants to know about the feedback of client.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the buylead consumption date.

- Executive shared a Telangana buylead on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested using Trade India for buyleads.

- Executive informed about IMS score and profile activity.

- Executive offered to add product photos and details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the product catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, trade india, catalog, pns
